title: "It's just a Normal"
body:
Just because you are playing a normal game, doesn't mean you are therefore forwarded the right to waste my fucking time and troll. You may be having fun playing {{champion:114}} {{champion:27}} {{champion:34}} {{champion:78}} {{champion:134}} {{champion:37}} {{champion:26}} {{champion:154}} {{champion:44}} and feeding, but you are fucking over 4 people that want to win a game of LoL. Wasting 20 minutes of my life to run around the map and let the other team kill us all. If you do this, I FUCKING HATE YOU. In other games you can leave, and find a different game with less trolls, but not League. I have to wait til at least 20 minutes before I can surrender, and i need 3 other people for that. God forbid you are doing it with a buddy. Then you add another 15 minutes of my time wasted cuz you thinks it's funny to die. Who in the hell has fun LOSING.

Obviously, i'm angry, but i need to vent.
-Uth

replies.body:
Here's a philosophy:

We're all playing a game. It's not fucking life or death. Nobody deserves to be verbally degraded in their free time because they don't treat this game like a career.

If you opt not to play ranked because you aren't a part of the "I have no future so I'll climb to challenger and join an LCS team" delusion, you owe nothing to your team but to play how you feel like.

I don't intentionally troll or play like shit on purpose, but it pisses me off to see people cry like little children over misplays etc. This is mario kart, this is sonic the hedgehog, this is pinball. Other people are involved and it makes it more fun, but in the end its a video game made to have fun.

Troll me all you want bro!

> [{quoted}](name=All Chat Referee,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=hTxWKaFt,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2015-08-19T09:03:54.262+0000)
>
> Here's a philosophy:
> 
> We're all playing a game. It's not fucking life or death. Nobody deserves to be verbally degraded in their free time because they don't treat this game like a career.
> 
> If you opt not to play ranked because you aren't a part of the "I have no future so I'll climb to challenger and join an LCS team" delusion, you owe nothing to your team but to play how you feel like.
> 
> I don't intentionally troll or play like shit on purpose, but it pisses me off to see people cry like little children over misplays etc. This is mario kart, this is sonic the hedgehog, this is pinball. Other people are involved and it makes it more fun, but in the end its a video game made to have fun.
> 
> Troll me all you want bro!

RIght. I'm not saying I get so angry that I want to hurt people, but I go in expecting the people I am playing with to want to win, because losing just sucks. When people start running lane to lane giving out free gold, how can I have fun? Is my Vayne better than this persons Jinx, who knows, cuz jungle anivia is feeding every lane and i don't get a chance to find out. The game is about having fun, and people take that away for a few chuckles, or the reaction of people in game. It sounds like an angry child but its just my competitive nature, whom enjoys winning.

Are you trying to insult specific champions?

I'm conflicted because I hate the, "it's just normals" people with a passion because they suck all the fun out of my day, but some of those champions are strong picks right now. I don't get why you picked {{champion:114}} as your first one? That one makes the least sense out of all of them.

> [{quoted}](name=Chaton,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=hTxWKaFt,comment-id=0007,timestamp=2015-08-21T11:53:09.849+0000)
>
> Are you trying to insult specific champions?
> 
> I'm conflicted because I hate the, "it's just normals" people with a passion because they suck all the fun out of my day, but some of those champions are strong picks right now. I don't get why you picked {{champion:114}} as your first one? That one makes the least sense out of all of them.

I just picked champions, my god people need to relax.
Never said they were bad. THe fact people make that assumption means there is a stigma for those champs that they are bad. You are calling them bad friend. You.

> [{quoted}](name=Uthgardt,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=hTxWKaFt,comment-id=00070000,timestamp=2015-08-21T16:06:45.525+0000)
>
> I just picked champions, my god people need to relax.
> Never said they were bad. THe fact people make that assumption means there is a stigma for those champs that they are bad. You are calling them bad friend. You.

No they aren't bad, and we are not calling them bad. The reason we are asking is because we're so surprised someone thinks they are bad.

Nice try though.

> [{quoted}](name=Chaton,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=hTxWKaFt,comment-id=000700000000,timestamp=2015-08-21T22:04:23.284+0000)
>
> No they aren't bad, and we are not calling them bad. The reason we are asking is because we're so surprised someone thinks they are bad.
> 
> Nice try though.

DId you even bother to read what I said? {{item:3070}}  Guess not

> [{quoted}](name=Uthgardt,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=hTxWKaFt,comment-id=0007000000000000,timestamp=2015-08-22T01:41:43.952+0000)
>
> DId you even bother to read what I said? {{item:3070}}  Guess not

It didn't have any substance, but yes I read it. 

Again, nice try.

> [{quoted}](name=Chaton,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=hTxWKaFt,comment-id=00070000000000000000,timestamp=2015-08-22T02:43:21.848+0000)
>
> It didn't have any substance, but yes I read it. 
> 
> Again, nice try.

I sense an asshole.

Get a life dude. It's way better than whining and berating people.

The reason why so many people asked what you were trying to imply by adding specific champions is because a lot of those champions preform extremely well, which goes against your whole troll theory. It's just BS, and if that makes you angry then maybe you should not post on a public board. Fragile feelings and all.

> [{quoted}](name=Chaton,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=hTxWKaFt,comment-id=0007000000000000000000000000,timestamp=2015-08-22T03:48:27.378+0000)
>
> Get a life dude. It's way better than whining and berating people.
> 
> The reason why so many people asked what you were trying to imply by adding specific champions is because a lot of those champions preform extremely well, which goes against your whole troll theory. It's just BS, and if that makes you angry then maybe you should not post on a public board. Fragile feelings and all.

Lol this whole paragraph is a contradiction of what you are doing to me.

"Get a life dude. It's way better than whining and berating people."
^ this makes me laugh.

> [{quoted}](name=Uthgardt,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=hTxWKaFt,comment-id=,timestamp=2015-08-19T07:00:14.428+0000)
>
> Just because you are playing a normal game, doesn't mean you are therefore forwarded the right to waste my fucking time and troll. You may be having fun playing {{champion:114}} {{champion:27}} {{champion:34}} {{champion:78}} {{champion:134}} {{champion:37}} {{champion:26}} {{champion:154}} {{champion:44}} and feeding, but you are fucking over 4 people that want to win a game of LoL. Wasting 20 minutes of my life to run around the map and let the other team kill us all. If you do this, I FUCKING HATE YOU. In other games you can leave, and find a different game with less trolls, but not League. I have to wait til at least 20 minutes before I can surrender, and i need 3 other people for that. God forbid you are doing it with a buddy. Then you add another 15 minutes of my time wasted cuz you thinks it's funny to die. Who in the hell has fun LOSING.
> 
> Obviously, i'm angry, but i need to vent.
> -Uth

Are you implying there is something wrong with the champions you've listed?

I've been playing since about late season 3, and since then, these are the least picked champions in most of my games. Typically when I see these champions, it's someone trolling. Except Taric, he may be fabulous, but just awful.

> [{quoted}](name=Uthgardt,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=hTxWKaFt,comment-id=00030000,timestamp=2015-08-21T11:11:10.659+0000)
>
> I've been playing since about late season 3, and since then, these are the least picked champions in most of my games. Typically when I see these champions, it's someone trolling. Except Taric, he may be fabulous, but just awful.

Fiora being one of the least-picked champions in your games before her rework is a huge statistical anomaly considering she's had a high win rate since basically forever and an above average pick rate. She was basically a goddess of Solo Q.

Aniva has an above average play rate and win rate, as does Sona.

Singed has a low pick rate but tends to only be played by Singed mains, and also he's basically the strongest champion in the entire game, with the most 1v5 potential of any champion. Sort of joking, but I guarantee that some dumbass will chase you if you play as Singed in Solo Q. He finds a lot of success there.

No comment on Poppy, but yeah the others are fairly bad or at least are situational (Taric is a beast against an all AD comp). 

I'm just saying, even though you don't see a champion often doesn't mean they are bad. I'll play Singed in a normal game if I want to.

> [{quoted}](name=NemeBro,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=hTxWKaFt,comment-id=000300000000,timestamp=2015-08-21T11:17:40.105+0000)
>
> Fiora being one of the least-picked champions in your games before her rework is a huge statistical anomaly considering she's had a high win rate since basically forever and an above average pick rate. She was basically a goddess of Solo Q.
> 
> Aniva has an above average play rate and win rate, as does Sona.
> 
> Singed has a low pick rate but tends to only be played by Singed mains, and also he's basically the strongest champion in the entire game, with the most 1v5 potential of any champion. Sort of joking, but I guarantee that some dumbass will chase you if you play as Singed in Solo Q. He finds a lot of success there.
> 
> No comment on Poppy, but yeah the others are fairly bad or at least are situational (Taric is a beast against an all AD comp). 
> 
> I'm just saying, even though you don't see a champion often doesn't mean they are bad. I'll play Singed in a normal game if I want to.

I respect all of this information, but I never once said any of these champions were bad, except Taric.

You trying to insult those champions m8?

Talk shit get hit

> [{quoted}](name=Lane Cancer,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=hTxWKaFt,comment-id=0005,timestamp=2015-08-19T11:56:32.954+0000)
>
> You trying to insult those champions m8?
> 
> Talk shit get hit

LOL See you on the rift BRO.

Well, there are players who tryhard in ranked and after that just want to have some fun. Or they pick champion in normal first time to train. Or they want to try a different build/role. Trolls are bad anyway, but if you want to win-go play ranked, there are more people like you

Yeah I mean the title of this thread and what OP is talking about are 2 different things. 

Trolls suck no matter what, but someone just playing for fun and dying cause they're trying something weird or whatever and it didn't work out well then YES THIS IS JUST A NORM AND YOU CAN GET RIGGGIDY RIGGGIDY RRRRREEKT SON! 

COME AT ME!
Agreed. Every time I see someone like that on my team, I just want {{champion:254}} to punch them in the face. Outside of the game.
Thank you for voicing half of us.
